uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar

Class FBORenderer

  • uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar.FBORenderer

  • public class FBORenderer

    Renders sprites to a FrameBufferObject and thence to the screen Does not support bilinear filtering when smooth motion is enabled

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FBORenderer(float WIDTH, float HEIGHT, boolean fadeInEffect)
      Renders sprites to a FrameBufferObject and thence to the screen Does not support bilinear filtering when smooth motion is enabled
